name: Lower Mars Image Format and Tools (LMY)
short_description: LMY image codec and tools for small, 16-bit (or higher) displays on devices with limited resources. Image file size and quality rival GIF, PNG, and JPEG, but decompression is much less complex. Used commercially by Lower Mars. C/C++ and Java/j2ME include
